synopsis.text: This poignant anime short depicts a curious yet touching story about familial bonds enduring change. One day, a young child returns home to discover her mother has transformed into a cat. Initially confused by this unfamiliar feline form, the child comes to accept the transformation, finding comfort in her unaltered connection with her parent. Together, mother and child continue to quietly cherish their days, their relationship preserved like a gentle spring breeze. Crafted with grace by director Eri Kinoshita as a student project while attending Tokyo University of the Arts, this anime uses fantasy to explore the steadfastness of parental love.
synopsis.author: anthropic.claude-v2:1
